level_1.skillDescription:
Rush forward with your shield, successful attacks will release small Light elemental explosions
Can't be used during Guard Break

level_2.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to chain an attack after the rush
After the attack, a medium-sized Light elemental explosion will occur

level_3.skillDescription:
Adds the ability to chain up to 2 attacks
After the attack, a large-sized Light elemental explosion will occur

abilities.skillDescription: Increases damage against enemies with elemental status ailments
Increases the rate of elemental charge accumulation
